alert.note: Alert for Broward; Miami-Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 12 at 3:14PM EDT until April 12 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM EDT FOR NORTHERN MIAMI-DADE AND SOUTHERN BROWARD COUNTIES... At 313 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over West Park, or near Hollywood, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Fort Lauderdale, Pembroke Pines, Hollywood, Miramar and Davie. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
